entry.title: NielsenDigitalSDK/nielsenappsdk-ios-dynamic-spm-global
entry.summary:
Nielsen app sdk repository to distribute dynamic XCFramework release packages via SPM dependency manager for global market, supporting iOS, tvOS and MacOS Catalyst targets.

nielsenappsdk-ios-dynamic-spm-global

Nielsen app sdk repository to distribute dynamic XCFramework release packages via SPM dependency manager for Global market, supporting iOS, tvOS and MacOS Catalyst targets.

Installation

Nielsen AppSDK dynamic XCFramework via SPM dependency manager can be installed by following the steps mentioned here

Implementation

Nielsen AppSDK supports various digital measurement products. You can access the implementation guides for these products as below

Digital TV Ratings (DTVR) iOS Implementation Guide

Digital Content Ratings (DCR) Video iOS Implementation Guide

Digital Content Ratings (DCR) Static iOS Implementation Guide

License

Please read the license agreement presented here, which must be accepted in order to download the Nielsen SDKs. For more information, reach out to your Nielsen Technical Account Manager(TAM).
